title: Looking for friendly people to play Pool Party rewards 5v5's, add for that sexy IP Bonus!
body:
Looking for friendly people to play Pool Party rewards 5v5's, add for that sexy IP Bonus! 

Ingame name is Surgical .

I generally main top , so would prefer there if possible, otherwise open to mid or jg whatever is easiest, feel free to post here if you need me to add you if you cant find me or also invite your friends to join us ingame!

replies.body: Still looking! Online now, need one more for an aram! Add if wish to join us! :)
Added i main {{champion:432}} {{champion:12}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:111}}  and {{champion:1}} support if you need one :)
